title: Ep 376 | How the ‘Duck Dynasty’ Producers Tried to Cancel God & the Time Phil Converted a Crew Member
description:
Phil recalls the way the "Duck Dynasty" producers attempted to silence God's Word and how he converted a member of the film crew. Guest Bob DeMoss brings Phil a special gift and talks about collaborating with Phil and Al on the "Duck Commander Bible." Phil remembers the time he attempted to share Jesus with a person who was convinced he wasn't going to die. Zach is inspired to break down the verse that fuels Jase's hatred of meteorology. And Zach explains why people should focus on the formation rather than the information.

Matthew 16-18
